<title level="1" pfs="">[Gravedigger](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3495)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

An often-overlooked group of laborers, gravediggers have a reputation for being as quiet and grim as their workplace. They're usually strong and tough from their long hours of backbreaking labor, and they tend to have a unique perspective on life and death.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Gravedigger](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3495)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 69

**Perception** +6

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +7, [Graveyard Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +7, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +1

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[bull's-eye lantern](/Equipment.aspx?ID=29) (2 oils), gravedigger's garb (functions as [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=41)), [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2745) of [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=290), shovel

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +4 

**Will** +7 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 20

</row>

**Resistances**
[void](/Traits.aspx?ID=510) 2

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shovel +9,
**Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning

**Light in the Dark** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104), [Vitality](/Traits.aspx?ID=509)) **Requirements** The gravedigger is holding a [bull's-eye lantern](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2730) in one hand and their [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2745) in the other, and the lantern contains [oil](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2739); **Effect** The gravedigger recites a brief chant to ignite their lantern with vital energy. Each [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=722) creature in a 15-foot line takes 3d6 vitality damage with a DC 14 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save. This action uses all remaining oil in the bull's-eye lantern.

</column>
